snippet.title: Folklands - Release Date Trailer | Relaxing City Builder
snippet.description:
​Build, expand, and thrive in Folklands, launching into Early Access on March 24!​

Folklands is a relaxing settlement builder where you'll manage simulated citizens in a dynamic world. Gather resources, oversee production chains, and ensure your ever-growing community remains happy, employed, and safe.​

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2282890/Folklands/

Check out all Light Up Games strategy titles: 
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/LightUpGames

Follow us on social media: 
➤ Discord: https://discord.gg/Gz29mfqH4X
➤ Twitter: https://x.com/FolklandsGame

Video Details: Folklands - Release Date Trailer | Relaxing City Builder https://youtu.be/ZHACoFkWP-8

#Folklands #LightUpGames #CityBuilder #ColonySim #Gaming
